title: Title
name: Name
helpBoatManning1: Click on a paddler in the list to select them.
helpBoatManning2: Then click on an empty seat in the boat.
helpBoatManning3: To remove someone, hover over the seat and click the small X.
helpBoatManning4: Use the pin needle (top left of seat) to lock a paddler. They won't be moved by Magic AI.
helpSpecialItems2: Guest: Add temporary paddlers not in the squad.
helpToolsStats1: Magic AI: The wand automatically fills the boat optimally.
helpToolsStats2: Trim: Use the slider to adjust target weight (Bow/Stern).
helpToolsStats3: Export: Save the lineup as an image.
helpManageEvents1: Create new trainings or regattas using the form on the left.
helpManageEvents2: Click Plan to start boat manning for an event.
helpManageEvents3: Manage attendance directly in the event list.
helpMembers1: Add new members using the form.
helpMembers2: Edit members by clicking the pencil icon in the squad list.
helpMembers3: Delete members with the trash icon (requires 2x confirmation).
helpToolsDesc: Use the slider for trim and Magic AI for auto-fill.
imprintResponsible: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
tourWelcomeDesc: Here is a short tour of the main features.
tourNewEventDesc: Here you can create new trainings or races.
tourMembersDesc: Add new paddlers or edit existing members.
tourEventListDesc: Here you see all upcoming events and can manage attendance.
tourSquadDesc: All your team members at a glance.
tourStatsDesc: Here you see the weight distribution and can adjust the trim.
tourPoolDesc: All paddlers who confirmed for this event. Click a paddler to select them.
tourCanisterDesc: Add a 25kg canister as a placeholder or for weight balance.
tourGuestDesc: Add a guest paddler who is not in the regular member list.
tourBoatDesc: Click a seat to place the selected paddler. Use the "X" to remove and the pin needle to lock (protects from Magic AI changes).
tourMagicAIDesc: Let the AI automatically fill the boat optimally.
tourExportDesc: Save the current lineup as an image.
clV130Item3: Dark Mode syncs with system settings
clV120Item1: Interactive Guided Tours for Team View and Planner
clV120Item4: Unified design for all dialog windows
clV110Item1: New Header Design for better overview
clV100Item3: Boat Manning with Drag & Drop (Magic AI)

imprintLiabilityLinksText: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content.
